greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = smallest k such that 5k has a digit sum = n.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,10,-10).
formula: a(n) = a(n-1) + 10*a(n-9) - 10*a(n-10) for n > 14. - _Georg Fischer_, Oct 26, 2020
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Nov 07 2002
